title: unesco_heritage_Lord_Howe_Island_Group
text:
Name: Lord Howe Island Group. short_description:

A remarkable example of isolated oceanic islands, born of volcanic activity more than 2,000 m under the sea, these islands boast a spectacular topography and are home to numerous endemic species, especially birds.

. date_inscribed: 1982. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 159.0883333. latitude: -31.56555556. area_hectares: 146300. category_long: Natural. category_short: N. Country name: Australia. Region: Asia and the Pacific. iso_code: au. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
